revised_title: Integrated Pest Management: The Agrochemical Industry's Approach and Future Developments
tldr: This article discusses the agrochemical industry's approach to integrated pest control, explaining the principles and components of integrated pest management (IPM) as a systems approach to crop protection. The author highlights the industry's commitment to supporting IPM and its development, as well as the challenges and future trends in implementing IPM in practice.
